thread.title: Emilia Clarke, Jason Momoa had 'Game of Thrones' reunion
thread.title_full: Emilia Clarke, Jason Momoa had 'Game of Thrones' reunion

author: Deccan
title: Emilia Clarke, Jason Momoa had 'Game of Thrones' reunion
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 05, 2015, 16.26 pm Mumbai: ‘Game of Thrones’ fans this may be the best day of your life as actors Emilia Clarke and Jason Momoa reunited to share a photo when they met at Paris Fashion Week.
Clarke, who plays the role of Daenerys Targaryen/Khaleesi while Momoa essayed the role of Khal Drogo in the popular HBO fantasy TV series. However, the dothraki died in the first season of GOT. Clarke shared a picture of the two actors having fun on her Instagram page and so did Jason setting the social media abuzz.
"Well I guess the sun rises in the west and sets in the east then huh? Paris fashion week just kicked off! #Momoaloveforlifebaby #nomorebeerleftinparis #bestdresseddothraki."
Can it get any better than this?
